title: How to Make Moth Repellent Sachets

steps.headline: Make sachets using suitable fabric such as muslin or calico.
steps.description: The size of the sachets is dependent on how large you wish to make them; smaller sachets are suitable for drawers and larger ones are best for cupboards and wardrobes. If you are going to hang your sachet, attach a ribbon or an elastic loop that you can use to hang it with. Leave an opening one end for the insertion of the contents.

steps.headline: Fill your sachets with equal quantities of the ingredients listed above.
Stitch the sachet together by hand.
Attach any decorative elements if wished.
Place in your drawers, blanket chest or hang in wardrobes.

text: Make sachets using suitable fabric such as muslin or calico. The size of the sachets is dependent on how large you wish to make them; smaller sachets are suitable for drawers and larger ones are best for cupboards and wardrobes. If you are going to hang your sachet, attach a ribbon or an elastic loop that you can use to hang it with. Leave an opening one end for the insertion of the contents. Combine the ingredients well.  Fill your sachets with equal quantities of the ingredients listed above.  Stitch the sachet together by hand.  Attach any decorative elements if wished.  Place in your drawers, blanket chest or hang in wardrobes.
